messages.message:
Hi Team,

Based on the provenance info of the refined phrases from the flow result API, how can I get the OCR confidence for the extracted output? Is there a way to backtrack the bboxes to the ibmsg and get the OCR confidence?

This is for a client who needs the OCR confidence for their downstream system,

cc: @Orlando
it seems you should be able to get OCR confidence per word https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CJ7E9RG7Q/p1685631486021309?thread_ts=1685620704.262719&cid=CJ7E9RG7Q

@Venkatesh i think there is a PFR for this as well in the future. I know RM also wants this
CC: @amber

yes, good catch @Piyush! @Venkatesh - Rocket has asked us to add OCR and model confidence scores to the IB flow results API (PFR 1203 (https://www.google.com/url?q=https://instabase.atlassian.net/jira/polaris/projects/PFR/ideas/view/2790165?selectedIssue%3DPFR-1203%26issueViewSection%3Dcomments&sa=D&source=calendar&ust=1688231202057386&usg=AOvVaw02CAFG0IyxkN8ChSf-XgrZ)). We were trying to determine a workaround, but are blocked by refined fields character confidence often returning null results (PFR 1218 (https://www.google.com/url?q=https://instabase.atlassian.net/jira/polaris/projects/PFR/ideas/view/372748?selectedIssue%3DPFR-1218%26issueViewSection%3Dcomments&sa=D&source=calendar&ust=1688231202057386&usg=AOvVaw1_ba0NLjzwLFDgMJ0OqU_S)).

I've added you to our call with Lydia, Dominic, and Eric tomorrow to discuss this further!

cc: @Orlando
I might not be able to make this as I’m travelling at that time but I’ll try to
yeah it's super late for you, Orlando, but I can plan to record
